Interface RouteBuilder.RouteDeclaration

  • Enclosing interface:
    RouteBuilder 

    public static interface RouteBuilder.RouteDeclaration
    Route Declaration.

    • Method Detail

      • method

        RouteBuilder.RouteDeclaration method(String httpMethod)
        Set Route method.
        Parameters:
        httpMethod - HTTP method
        Returns:
        a new RouteDeclaration using the given HTTP method

      • on

        RouteBuilder.RouteDeclaration on(String path)
        Set Route path.
        Parameters:
        path - Route path
        Returns:
        a new RouteDeclaration using the given path

      • to

        <T> RouteBuilder.RouteDeclaration to(Class<T> controllerType,
                                     ControllerCallRecorder<T> callRecorder)
        Set Route controller type, method and parameters.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Parameterized controller type
        Parameters:
        controllerType - the controller type
        callRecorder - a closure for the controller type to record a method invocation
        Returns:
        a new RouteDeclaration using the given controller method
